title: very nice temple of Lord Shiva
review: This place is just like heaven. This place has one of the oldest statue of Lord Shiva. This place is very much peaceful. Many peoples come here to spend some time with yourself.

title: Great View
review: It has simply great and scenic views of the ranges around. As rightly said by the fellow reviewers, there's nothing to do here as such except from experience the vastness of the ranges around. Can be visited for beauty. Little away from Nainital.

title: Incredible views.
review: It's incredibly peaceful up here with not much else to do but enjoy the views and the mountain air.Incredible views.

title: One of the best views of the Himalayas !!
review: Just 1 and a half to 2 hours away from Nainital on the way to Mukteshwar, its a must visit place to enjoy the view of the Majestic Himalayas.

title: Panoramic view of the Himalayas
review: We made a photo-stop at this place on way to Mukteswar, from Nainital. Mukteswar is famous for its Shiva temple, situated on a hilltop.

title: Beautiful
review: here you will find very small villages with nice houses and neat and clean environment.  really enjoyed visiting Managir.

title: Excellent View of the Himalayan Range
review: A must visit to this point. The Himalayan Range in all its grandeur is visible from here. Its an awesome sight. If its not cloudy try to see it during sunrise or set.

title: Himalaya Darshan
review: The local tour car will take you here and there will be guys with telescope which will show you himalaya hills from Nainital.

title: on the way to mukteshwar
review: the himalyan view is amazing from here ... for that matter whole way has somewhat little or big himalyan view but some points offers great views ... ramgarh .. mukteshwar ..gagar

title: The view is thrilling! #Himalayas
review: Such An amazing view from this place ! The himalayas look so amazing, but it depends on the weather. if you are lucky enough to see them nicely.

title: Nice abode on the hills...
review: This is a silent village located in the outskirts... Untouched and a great place for a small visit or exploration... hotels are available at reasonable pricing...

title: Best View from here ..
review: If you are going to Nainital then should go to this place , it is 50 KM away form Nanital on way to Nauchaukiyatal .. View from Musteshwaer is awesome .

title: Beautiful view of Himalayas from Mukhteswar
review: Mukhteswar temple for Lord Shivji is located on a mountain top.It is an ancient  temple.
